page.title: 07SLAUGHTERHOUSE & MAGGOT FARM
page.content: Set in a quiet valley these 2 small establishments,with one owner,are the only places which could be classed as light industry within this D.Block. The slaughterhouse,employing 2 men, receives only dead animals from local farms;these are cut up and dressed. The meat,which is all unfit for human consumption,goes to a {pet food }firm in Crewe for canning. The {skins }are bought by a firm in Lichfield,which makes small {leather }items such as handbags. Some waste meat goes to the Corvedale Bait Company,across the yard on the same site. Here,{maggots} are bred,stored in large fridges and retailed by the gallon to fishing tackle shops.One man is employed to tend the bait company. In addition two lorries are used for transportation of goods.
